tutorials.title: How do I create alerts on statistical outliers and deviations in Logging Analytics?
tutorials.description: Explains creation of alarm on real-life based use case. Creating a alarm if there are more than 30% of failed APIs.

tutorials.description: Explains how to create OCI Alarms and verify it.
